pages.text: You were quite simple-minded, weren't you? Thought you knew everything, but this everything was always merely half the truth.\\You know better now. This white, pure gemstone you hold in your hand, shimmering in a soft, warm glow, is the monument to that.

You have never been remotely omnipotent, never will be. Not with all the magic in the world. No one is. But with a little humility, care and support, you can at least get a little closer.\\[#](ffffff)**Purity.**
